name: Compiled Help Index File
summary: Learn about .CHW files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: CHW files may be very large in size because they are not compressed. However, if you use a program such as KeyCHW or The Helpware Group's FAR, you can compress CHW files and decrease the file size substantially.
The FAR software allows you to view the contents of a CHW file. Choose Authoring â†’ Help File Explorer... from the application menu and then select your CHW file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
